SELECT pqi.id, pqi.plan_id, pqi.supplier_id, pqi.STATUS, pqi.materials_code, pqi.total_price, pqi.create_date, pqi.quotation_date, pqi.unit_price, pqi.end_date, pqi.del_flag,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit,
ppi.purchase_code, ppi.CODE AS planCode, ppi.purchase_num FROM purchase_quotation_info pqi LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = pqi.supplier_info) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.CODE = pqi.materials_code) LEFT JOIN purchase_plan_info ppi ON (ppi.id = pqi.plan_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND pqi.del_flag = 0
AND ppi.CODE like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.planCode},"%")
AND mi.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.materialsName},"%")
AND si.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND pqi.STATUS = #{queryForm.status}
AND si.sys_user_id = #{queryForm.supplierUserId}
ORDER BY pqi.create_date DESC

si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
